content: NHL = No Hockey League (from Tom Peter's Log http://www.tompeters.com/entries.php?rss=1&note=http://www.tompeters.com/blogs/main/007478.php)

Here's another thing to mention about Bob.  The apology that you quote wasn't given until the media asked him if he wanted to apologize.

And then he tries to spin the apology to make Bettman look bad.

Brutal.
